name: No Escape (itch) (ToaztyXD)
description:
There is an evil creature trying to kill you but you are blocked off. Click the tiles that break to repair them and keep the evil creature blocked off. Don't let the wall get taken all the way down or else you will die.

Controls:

- Mouse Click

Goal: Survive as long as possible.

For best experience play fullscreen!

Also, beware that there is a lot of clicking so if your hand/fingers start to hurt PLEASE stop playing.

(Also there is no main menu screen sorry)

Credit:

- Sound Effects from pixabay.com

- Pixel art created in Piskel

- Game made in Unity
